virtual void glr::glw::Texture2D::pushToVideoMemory ( )
virtual

Will stream the latest graphics data into opengl memory.

Implements glr::glw::IGraphicsObject.

void glr::glw::Texture2D::setData ( utilities::Image *  image)

If the image is of the same format, width, and height of the previously uploaded image, you call 'pushToVideoMemory()' after calling this method.

If the image is NOT of the same format, width, or height of the previously uploaded image, you need to call 'freeVideoMemory()', 'allocateVideoMemory()', and then 'pushToVideoMemory()' in order to get the image data uploaded to the video card properly.

Parameters
image
